thread.section_title: Derbyhouse Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Derbyhouse | derbyhouse.co.uk | 4 of 57
thread.title: Wendy Hutchinson JP
thread.title_full: Derbyhouse reviewed by Wendy Hutchinson JP

author: Wendy Hutchinson JP
title: Wendy Hutchinson JP
text:
This is a really lovely fleece. I particularly love the satin inside the shoulder area as this stops rubbing.
The fit is perfect, but most of all I love the fact that it was advertised as a weight ie. 280gram Fleece. I have struggled with which is heavier a fleece or a rug liner and the fact it was advertised with a weight was extremely helpful and I hope more companies will do this in the future.
I am amazed at how reasonably priced this fleece is having now seen the quality. I am considering buying more so that I have spare ones.
Great product as always from Derby House.
Thank You
